name: list-delivery-usage
description: Returns a list of delivery usage records and their associated Asset IDs or Live Stream IDs.

page.description: Offset by this many pages, of the size of `limit`

limit.description: Number of items to include in the response

asset_id.description: Filter response to return delivery usage for this asset only. You cannot specify both the `asset_id` and `live_stream_id` parameters together.

live_stream_id.description: Filter response to return delivery usage for assets for this live stream. You cannot specify both the `asset_id` and `live_stream_id` parameters together.

timeframe[].description: Time window to get delivery usage information. timeframe[0] indicates the start time, timeframe[1] indicates the end time in seconds since the Unix epoch. Default time window is 1 hour representing usage from 13th to 12th hour from when the request is made.

$ul: **limit**: Number of assets returned in this response. Default value is 100.
